question: 京都
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>capital</kanji> <kanji>metropolis</kanji> back in the day was <vocabulary>Kyoto</vocabulary>. Now of course the capital is Tokyo, but kanji doesn't know this. That's why Kyoto is the capital metropolis!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
